text: Cybernator also known in Japan as is a 2D mecha game developed by Masaya in 1992, for Super Famicom. The second entry of Assault Suits series, it is the prequel of Target Earth (Assault Suits Leynos in Japan). Also release in PlayStation 2, and releases Worldwide by Konami and Palcom. The story follows Jake Brain and his pilot, where fighting agains giant mecha. title: Cybernator
